column1: #Text=Götze to make Dortmund return , Schürrle completes Dortmund offensive lineup

#Text=On Thursday , German football club Borussia Dortmund ( BVB ) announced Mario Götze would rejoin the club from their arch rivals Bayern Munich after obligatory medical tests ; Götze is to sign a four-year contract .
#Text=On Friday , BVB announced signing André Schürrle from VfL Wolfsburg .
#Text=2014 FIFA World Cup winning goal scorer
#Text=Götze has spent twelve years with Borussia Dortmund , joining the youth ranks in 2001 .
#Text=The 24-year-old midfielder has scored 44 goals in 156 Bundesliga appearances ; 22 goals for each club .
#Text=In three seasons with Bayern , Götze won three Bundesliga titles , two DFB-Pokal titles , and a UEFA Super Cup .
#Text=With Dortmund , he won two League titles and a DFB Cup .
#Text=Making his international debut in November 2010 , Götze has played 56 matches and scored seventeen goals .
#Text=As both the clubs reached the agreement , Borussia Dortmund 's CEO Hans-Joachim Watzke said , " Personally , I 'm absolutely delighted that Mario has chosen to come back to Borussia Dortmund .
